entries.journal_entry_description: Now that you've gained the trust of the Myyydril people, Chief Kallaarac has sent you to complete a very important task. Currently, the Urnsor'is are advancing dangerously. Chief Kallaarac needs you to thin their numbers by killing 15 of them.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Travel to the Deep Depths of the Myyydril Caverns and destroy 15 Urnsor'is creatures.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Return to Chief Kallaarac in the Myyydril village.
